overview: Packed full of laughs! A funny thing happens when a small time private eye (Q Hustle) becomes a victim of guilt by association and is forced to team up with a small time street hustler who can't seem to stay out of trouble. With no game plan and teamed with a guy he just met, Q must now figure out a way to pull off an impossible heist and solve his biggest case ever at the same time.
title: Super Hustle
